title: LoL will not open
body:
When I try to open LoL i cant because it says PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working and then says windows is trying to find a solution to the problem.
Anyone please help!! :) I have re-downloaded the game 2 times if that helps!

replies.body:
PVP.net Patcher Kernel errors are typically caused by League not running with administrative privileges. I recommend working through our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for common solutions to this issue.

Let me know if these steps helped resolve the issue.
Try opening it in administer mode.
